TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit LegendCellColumn extends System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartNamedElement implements class System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.IChartMapArea
Public Class LegendCellColumn Inherits ChartNamedElement Implements IChartMapArea
type LegendCellColumn = class inherit ChartNamedElement interface IChartMapArea

summary.span: 表示图例中的单元列，用于扩展默认图例的功能。

span.span: Represents a cell column in a legend, which is used to extend the functionality of the default legend.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以按任意顺序，这将使您能够灵活地扩展默认图例项的功能放置任意数量的单元格的列。Any number of cell columns can be placed in any order, which gives you the flexibility to extend the abilities of the default legend entries. 图例单元列都只适用于从序列或数据点自动生成的项。The legend cell columns are only applicable to items that are automatically generated from series or data points.

summary.span: 获取或设置图例单元列的类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the legend cell column type.

value.span: 一个 枚举值。

span.span: A enumeration value.

value.span: 此值表示将用于定义图例单元列内容的类型。

span.span: This value represents the type that will be used to define the legend cell column contents.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性确定的内容将显示在每个单独的图例单元列的类型。This property determines the type of content that will be displayed in each individual legend cell column. 有两个可能值：There are two possible values: - 文本： 默认情况下，#LEGENDTEXT 关键字用来放置每个单元格的列中的值。Text: By default, the #LEGENDTEXT keyword is used to place the value in each cell column. 但是，可以使用属性来设置相应序列的值将替换为任何关键字。However, you can use the property to set any keyword(s) that will be replaced by a value of the corresponding series. - SeriesSymbol： 图例单元格将包含序列符号，如矩形、 线条、 使用标记或标记，作为其相应序列相同的填充颜色的行。SeriesSymbol: The legend cell will contain a series symbol, such as a rectangle, line, line with marker, or marker, of the same fill color as its corresponding series.

summary.span: 获取或设置图例单元列的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text of the legend cell column.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示图例单元列的文本。

span.span: A value that represents the text for the legend cell column.

value.span: 默认值为零长度的字符串。

span.span: The default value is a zero-length string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性才适用如果设置为。This property is only applicable if the is set to .

summary.span: 获取或设置图例单元列的工具提示文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the tooltip text for the legend cell column.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示图例单元列的工具提示。

span.span: A value that represents the tooltip for the legend cell column.

value.span: 默认值为零长度的字符串。

span.span: The default value is a zero-length string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置此属性将没有任何效果，如果属性设置为`false`。Setting this property will have no effect if the property is set to `false`. 默认值为 `true`。The default value is `true`. **重要**若要以这种方式，创建图像映射的属性对象必须设置为。**Important** To create an image map in this manner, the property of the object must be set to . 可以使用二进制流时创建图像映射，但必须使用另一种方法。It is possible to create an image map when using binary streaming, but another technique must be used. 如果`ToolTip`属性设置为图例项和图例单元格，则图例单元格属性具有的优先级。If the `ToolTip` property is set for both a legend item and a legend cell, the legend cell property has precedence. 这属性可以设置特殊关键字，以显示不同类型的与图表相关的数据。This property allows you to set special keywords to display different types of chart-related data. 若要创建具有用户定义的坐标的图像映射，请使用根的属性对象。To create image maps that have user-defined coordinates, use the property of the root object.

summary.span: 获取或设置自动从序列或数据点生成的图例单元格列的 URL 目标。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL target of the legend cell columns automatically generated from a series or data point.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示图表元素的目标 URL 或定位点。

span.span: A value that represents the destination URL or anchor point of the chart element.

value.span: 若要使用绝对 URL，请以“http://”或“www.”开始字符串表达式。

span.span: To use an absolute URL start the string expression with either "http://" or "www.".

value.span: 如果字符串不是以上述前缀之一开始，则将该字符串视为一个相对 URL。

span.span: If the string does not start with either of these prefixes it will be treated as a relative URL.

value.span: 默认值为零长度的字符串。

span.span: The default value is a zero-length string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果设置此属性，将自动创建一个客户端图像映射。If you set this property, a client-side image map will be automatically created. 映射区还将创建其 Href 特性设置为指定的定位点或 URL。A map area will also be created with its Href attribute set to the specified anchor or URL. 设置此属性将没有任何效果，如果属性设置为`false`。Setting this property will have no effect if the property is set to `false`. 默认值为 `true`。The default value is `true`. 属性的映射区域，例如，目标 = _blank，可以通过使用指定属性。Attributes of the map area(s), for example, target=_blank, can be specified by using the property. 属性可以设置特殊关键字，以显示不同类型的与图表相关的数据。The property allows you to set special keywords to display different types of chart-related data. 若要创建具有用户定义的坐标的图像映射，请使用根的属性对象。To create image maps that have user-defined coordinates, use the property of the root object.
